description:
Facebook identity provider, let you register and set up permissions and authorization options for OAuth 2.0 protocol.

https://developers.facebook.com/docs/facebook-login/manually-build-a-login-flow/

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Required. The client ID you received from Facebook when you registered.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Required. The client secret you received from Facebook for your Facebook App.

apiVersion.title: Facebook API Version
apiVersion.description: Facebook Graph API version to use. Version 24.0 includes appsecret_proof for enhanced security.

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: Scopes let you specify exactly what type of access you need. Scopes limit access for OAuth tokens.

connectTimeout.title: HTTP Client connect timeout
connectTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that connects will block. (default 10000 ms)

idleTimeout.title: HTTP Client idle timeout
idleTimeout.description: Duration of time in milliseconds that request will hold. (default 10000 ms)

maxPoolSize.title: HTTP Client max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum pool of connections can grow to. (default 200)
